#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

long long in_base_5(long long n) {
  long long res = 0;
  long long out = 1;

  while (n > 0) {
    res = out * (n % 5) + res;
    n /= 5;
    out *= 10;
  }
  
  return res;
}

int main() {
  int t;
  long long k;

  scanf("%d", &t);

  for (int i = 0; i < t; ++i) {
    scanf("%lld", &k);

    printf("%lld\n", 2LL * in_base_5(k - 1));
  }

  return 0;
}
